core

Interface SlotInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InNode, PolyInNode, Slot

    public interface SlotInterface
    Slot interface is one of the two base elements of all the inter-object communication. It provide a generic emitter/slot infrastructure using the Value to pass any kind of data. It receive the value emitted from the slots
    Author:
    martino
